I have discoloration in my underarms that looks like reddish-brown patches.

I've noticed the patches for about 6 months.

No, they do not itch or cause any discomfort.

No, I don't have any known allergies or chronic skin conditions.

I deny any history of skin conditions or endocrine disorders in my family.
Final Diagnosis: Acanthosis Nigricans
